div.p: PSUMBMISSIONSREJECTIONS is a sub-tag belonging within WRITING PRODUCTION . It holds information (at least one full sentence) about daring, significant, or turning-point submissions and about rejections of work by publishers. It has no mandatory or optional sub-elements or attributes.

div.codeblock: <PSUBMISSIONSREJECTIONS>When DB sent the book to publishers, it was met with rejections from seven major companies until it found its way to<NAME>T. S. Eliot</NAME> at <ORGNAME>Faber and Faber</ORGNAME>.</PSUBMISSIONSREJECTIONS>
